ygData.subject: Thex Mallet
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually you need 2 different parts of the Thex Mallet from the elf skeleton. He drops the head and shaft i believe. The 3rd part is on a 25ish zombie in
ygData.messageBody:
Actually you need 2 different parts of the Thex Mallet
from the elf skeleton. He drops the head and shaft i
believe. The 3rd part is on a 25ish zombie in befallen
named Commander Windstream (or something like that).
That would be the handle, which when you right click
on it, opens like a container, with a COMBINE button.
You put the other 2 pieces in there and COMBINE. And
low and behold..the Thex Mallet.To get him to spawn,or
so i hear, you need to turn in the note from Gix to
Skeleton Llrodd. To get the note you need to say some
phrase which i dont know, but i believe its a SK
guildmaster in Neriak that tells you what it is.

Good Luck with it

Bathory D'Allatu
Minions of Darkness
Cazic-Thule

--- "Grant, Joseph" <JGrant@...> wrote:
> From: "Grant, Joseph" <JGrant@...>
>
> Howdy.
>
> I'm new to this list so....
>
> For the thex mallet quest you need to kill the
> paladin, Sir Lindeal in
> Lavastorm. Only thing is hes a rare spawn outside
> Najena and the Fire
> Elementals kill him. You also need good faction
> with Lrodd I believe as you
> have to give him or his pet a note from Kizdean Gix.
>
> Joe.
>
> Nenadar
> 16th Shadow Knight
> Bristlebane
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: rich.hitz@... [mailto:rich.hitz@...]
> Sent: 09 September 1999 15:42
> To: Shadowknight@onelist.com
> Subject: [shadowknight] Happenings
>
>
> From: rich.hitz@...
>
> Well I hit 13th last night. FINALLY!
> I got tired of running from Fire Elementals in
> Lavastorm
> and went to Befallen and camped Lrodd. I noticed
> that
> after killing him a few times at a yellow con, he
> started conning even a few times and then blue. I
> guess
> there is some anti camp code that makes him a weaker
>
> spawn, or it could be a set cycle. <shrug>
> 3 very kewl things happened to me there.
> A high level shaman cast shrink on me! That was so
> kewl. No ducking the entire time I was there, and I
> FLEW
> through everything.
> A 34th level druid cast Regeneration on me. That was
>
> awesome! I was at 1/4 bub of health after fighting
> Lrodd (didn't use HT once since I was camping him :)
> )
> and I went up to full in a very short amount of time
>
> instead of the 10+ minutes I normally spend healing.
> It
> also lasted through 3 more fights with Lrodd and
> other
> assorted denezines of Befallen.
> That same Druid killed the Elf Skeleton (Red to me)
> and
> got the Thex Mallet shaft and then gave it to me. He
>
> said he was on another quest and didn't need it. I
> have
> no idea if I can even comlete the quest, but I will
> look
> that up shortly. Heh.
> Anyone alive out there?
>
